title: Injunctive relief
context: [ยง440E-30] Injunctive relief. The director may, in addition to any other remedies available, bring an action in any court of this State to enjoin a person from continuing any violation of this chapter or doing any acts in furtherance thereof, and for any other relief that the court deems appropriate. [L 2007, c 279, pt of ยง1]
